# Convert the CSV string to a DataFrame
df = pd.read_csv(io.StringIO(data.strip()))

def get_unique_values(column_name):
    return ["All"] + sorted(df[column_name].astype(str).unique().tolist())

app_ui = ui.page_fluid(
    ui.panel_title("Systematic Literature Review Dashboard"),
    ui.layout_sidebar(
        ui.sidebar(
            ui.input_text("title_search", "Search in Title", placeholder="Enter keywords"),
            ui.input_text("journal_search", "Search in Journal/Conference", placeholder="Enter keywords"),
            ui.input_select("product_filter", "Product", choices=get_unique_values("Product")),
            ui.input_select("kind_of_paper_filter", "Kind of Paper", choices=get_unique_values("Kind_of_paper")),
            ui.input_select("grouping_filter", "Grouping", choices=get_unique_values("Grouping")),
            width="300px"
        ),
        ui.output_data_frame("papers_table"),
    ),
    ui.tags.style("""
        .shiny-data-frame-container {
            overflow-x: auto;
            max-width: 100%;
            height: calc(100vh - 100px);
        }
    """)
)

def server(input, output, session):
    @reactive.calc
    def filtered_data():
        data = df.copy()
        
        if input.title_search():
            data = data[data["Title"].str.contains(input.title_search(), case=False)]
        
        if input.journal_search():
            data = data[data["Journal_Conference"].str.contains(input.journal_search(), case=False)]
        
        if input.product_filter() != "All":
            data = data[data["Product"].astype(str) == input.product_filter()]
        
        if input.kind_of_paper_filter() != "All":
            data = data[data["Kind_of_paper"].astype(str) == input.kind_of_paper_filter()]
        
        if input.grouping_filter() != "All":
            data = data[data["Grouping"].astype(str) == input.grouping_filter()]
        
        return data

    @output
    @render.data_frame
    def papers_table():
        return render.DataGrid(
            filtered_data(),
            row_selection_mode="multiple",
            width="100%",
            height="100%",
        )

app = App(app_ui, server)
